entry.title: test1
entry.content:
My title

I really like using MarkDown.

I think I’ll use it format all of my documents from now on.

This is the first line.
And this is the second line.

Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle.

The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor and keep the fire fed with wood.

The quarterly results look great!

  • Revenue was off the chart.
  • Profits were higher than ever.

Everything is going according to plan.

    1. First item    2. Second item    3. Third item    4. Fourth item    def img_grearte():        mask = imread("boy.png")        with open("txt_save.txt", "r") as file:            txt = file.read()        word = WordCloud(background_color="white",                 width=800,                 height=800,                 font_path='simhei.ttf',                 mask=mask,                 ).generate(txt)        word.to_file('test.png')        print("词云图片已保存")        plt.imshow(word)  # 使用plt库显示图片        plt.axis("off")        plt.show()

这是一个连接百度

hjgh
